service_figures: INT has over 27 years of experience in delivering comprehensive data consulting and insights management solutions. The company employs a structured methodology that includes gathering, harmonizing, and refining relevant data, as well as applying analytical techniques to uncover hidden insights. INT utilizes various business intelligence tools such as Tableau and Power BI to convert data analysis into actionable storytelling formats. The company has successfully delivered predefined analytics solutions and managed services, ensuring scalability and optimization for its clients.
